price: لەو شارەی (صاڵح)دا نۆ کەس ھەبوون لەزەویدا خراپەکاریان دەکرد بەھیچ جۆر چاکەیان نەدەکرد
arabic: وَكَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ تِسۡعَةُ رَهۡطٖ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakāna fī al-madīnati tis'ʿatu rahṭin yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
